Open source, reimagined

Your open source journey, gamified.

Connect your GitHub, discover projects matched to your skill level, complete quests, earn XP, and level up as a contributor.

See How It Works
The Problem

Open source is broken for beginners

Most developers want to contribute, but the experience is overwhelming, unrewarding, and directionless.

Where do I start?

Finding beginner-friendly issues in large repos is frustrating and time-consuming.

No feedback loop

Contributions feel invisible. There's no reward or progression tracking.

No direction

Without guidance, contributors jump between projects with no clear path forward.

How It Works

Four steps to legendary status

01

Connect GitHub

Sign in with your GitHub account. We analyze your repos and activity to understand your skill level.

02

Get Matched

AI surfaces the best issues for your skill level — no more scrolling through thousands of repos.

03

Complete Quests

Each issue becomes a quest with difficulty rating, XP reward, and a step-by-step guide.

04

Level Up

Earn XP, unlock badges, climb leaderboards, and build a portfolio that speaks for itself.

Ready to start your quest?

Join 12,400+ developers who are turning commits into achievements. Connect your GitHub and start in under a minute.

OpenQuest

Gamify your open source journey. Discover, contribute, and level up.
